title: They Couldn't Win One Freakin Game....

replies.body: Deserved after Hai showed the middle finger to Febiven i started wanting AHQ to win vs them... before i wanted C9.... well happy that there is karma
That smiley... Are you implying that this was all planned by mastermind Ryu?
Look at NA's mentality towards the game and you will fully understand why NA can't compete with anyone else.
